name: nowplaying-cli
title: nowplaying-cli
description: It's using nowplaying-cli for macos in order to control playing video or music. It's have pause next and previous features
author: yusuf_akdeniz

commands.name: go-next
commands.title: Go to Next One
commands.subtitle: nowplaying-cli
commands.description: Goes up to the next music

commands.name: go-prev
commands.title: Go to Previous One
commands.subtitle: nowplaying-cli
commands.description: Goes up to the previous music
